long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ¯ Introducing DisneyPlus Subtitle Translator, a specialized tool crafted for DisneyPlus videos. This unique subtitle translator enhances the original DisneyPlus subtitles by providing bilingual or dual subtitles.

ğŸŒ DisneyPlus Subtitle Translator can seamlessly translate the official subtitles or captions of videos hosted on disneyplus.com into a wide array of commonly used languages. 

ğŸ›  Customize the subtitles to your liking with adjustable styles. You have the flexibility to set styles for bilingual subtitles independently, including options such as font size, font color, font weight, opacity, and background color.

ğŸš  The subtitles are housed within a draggable box, allowing you to effortlessly adjust their position according to your preferences.

ğŸ‘‰ Key Features:
âœ… Display bilingual subtitles
âœ… Support for most languages
âœ… Adjustable subtitle styles
âœ… Draggable subtitle position
âœ… Download subtitles with one click
âœ… Full-screen support

ğŸ— If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me at support@disneyplus-subtitle-translator.com.
